title: The Republic of Sao Tomé and Principe Implements the International Monetary Fund’s Enhanced General Data Dissemination System
description:
Download logo

The Republic of Sao Tomé and Principe has implemented the recommendations of the IMF’s Enhanced General Data Dissemination System (e-GDDS) by publishing critical data through the National Summary Data Page (NSDP). The page aims to serve as a one-stop publication vehicle for essential ...
